channel.title: Need ::unjail for delta base
channel.description: can some1 plz give me the ::unjail code for a delta based server?thanks

item.title: Need ::unjail for delta base
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“N0vlafe, post:4, topic:259879”]he said unjail here u go

if (command.startsWith("unjail")) { if (playerRights >= 1) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); client x = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; if (otherPIndex != -1) { if (x.isInJail() || x.isInJail2()) { x.toX = 3087; x.toY = 3489; x.action = 1; x.client.sM("You have been unjailed by " + playerName); sM("You have unjailed "+x.playerName+"."); } else { sM("This player is not in jail."); } } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to jail.."); } }[/quote]

sorry, read it wrong, i thought he said jail and unjail.

Read full topic

item.title: Need ::unjail for delta base

[quote=“N0vlafe, post:4, topic:259879”]he said unjail here u go

if (command.startsWith("unjail")) { if (playerRights >= 1) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); client x = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; if (otherPIndex != -1) { if (x.isInJail() || x.isInJail2()) { x.toX = 3087; x.toY = 3489; x.action = 1; x.client.sM("You have been unjailed by " + playerName); sM("You have unjailed "+x.playerName+"."); } else { sM("This player is not in jail."); } } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to jail.."); } }[/quote]
Oh my god. Learn conventions please.

item.title: Need ::unjail for delta base

item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

he said unjail here u go

if (command.startsWith("unjail")) { if (playerRights >= 1) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); client x = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; if (otherPIndex != -1) { if (x.isInJail() || x.isInJail2()) { x.toX = 3087; x.toY = 3489; x.action = 1; x.client.sM("You have been unjailed by " + playerName); sM("You have unjailed "+x.playerName+"."); } else { sM("This player is not in jail."); } } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to jail.."); } }

item.title: Need ::unjail for delta base
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }[/code]

might work…

Read full topic
